Title: Pictorial explanation of the First Five Year Plan (1953-1957) for the development of the national economy of our nation
Designer: General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总政治部)
Notes: "Pictorial explanation of the First Five Year Plan (1953-1957) for the development of the national economy of our nation" (我国发展国民经济的第一个五年(1953-1957)计划图解) is a series of 12 posters, ca. 1955, possibly incomplete.The eighth sheet, "Indicators of total aquatic product output value and livestock reproduction within five years" (五年内水产总产值及牲畜繁殖的指标), shows estimated increases in livestock. Below, "Indicators for forestry construction within five years" (五年内林业建设的指标), estimates for forestry.
